# Crop data


[SPAM](https://www.mapspam.info/) has crop area and yield data for 42 crops, by production systems (irrigated and rainfed).

[Harvested area and yield](http://www.earthstat.org/harvested-area-yield-175-crops/) for 175 crops.

[MIRCA2000](https://www.uni-frankfurt.de/45218023/MIRCA?legacy_request=1) monthly growing areas of 26 irrigated and rainfed crops 402 spatial units were compiled.

[Global crop calendars](https://nelson.wisc.edu/sage/data-and-models/crop-calendar-dataset/index.php) for 19 crops.
